content: this is a summary of a civil case in the alytaus district court the case involves the ownership of a car an opel merivaa that was jointly purchased by the applicant referred to as ab and the defendants father referred to as mg ab and mg lived together for 30 years without being married and shared a household they bought the car using personal funds and a loan after mg passed away the defendant referred to as rg claimed part of the car as an inheritance ab argues that the car should be declared as their joint property and requests ownership or a monetary equivalent of 210ths of the cars value the court determines that there is sufficient evidence to recognize the existence of an agreement between ab and mg as cohabitants making the car their joint property ab contributed more to the purchase and repayment of the car so the court awards them ownership of the car and denies rgs claim for a monetary equivalent the court also grants ab secondary legal aid and exempts them from paying 50 of the stamp duty costs the costs of the legal aid will be reimbursed by the state the court has made a decision in accordance with the civil procedure code of lithuania declaring the car as the common property of ab and mg ab owns 810 shares of the car and mg owns 210 shares the court awards the car to ab as their personal property
